extendedInfo.description: FRUIT are used and around children every day. But how to recognize and learn them.This is a very useful and effective educational application for toddler to learn FRUIT in English.This app help your kids learn FRUIT in English an easiest way with beautiful and clearly photo and American pronunciation .                 ****MAIN FEATURES***_ learn regularly FRUIT with clearly and beautiful picture ._ Real sound of AMERICAN pronunciation_ On touch you can listen to sounds again_ After learn all , your child will have quiz to test again the lesson : quiz very easy, your children just find correct photo in four numbers display base on AMERICAN sound._ Children can play game:  order letters to build the correct word base on AMERICAN soundCreating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new advertisement service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a icon on desktop for you to use and you will receive the ads notifications. It's not SPAM or VIRUS, don't worry about new permission update. Thank you for using my app!

reviews.comment: The quiz and play game are good help me to review
reviews.author: Chi Thong
